competitors.name: Accenture
competitors.notes: Revenue of $44.33B in 2020, strong cloud infrastructure and 120+ countries presence

competitors.name: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE)
competitors.notes: Major competitor in enterprise services and infrastructure

competitors.name: Microsoft
competitors.notes: Competitor in cloud (Azure), enterprise software, and AI

competitors.notes: Competitor in cloud computing and AI solutions

competitors.name: Oracle
competitors.notes: Competitor in enterprise software, databases, and cloud

competitors.notes: Indian IT services and consulting competitor

competitors.notes: IT services and digital transformation competitor

competitors.notes: Global IT consulting and services competitor

competitors.name: Apple
competitors.notes: Technology competitor in certain enterprise segments

context: In 2020, IBM had ~345,900 employees and revenue of $73.62B (down from 2019). The company was navigating a challenging transition period with intense competition across cloud, IT services, and enterprise software.
